recipesJson.name: Cafe' Crunch
recipesJson.author: Jorgasm
recipesJson.description: Coffee and Cereal Milk - My long time ADV.  Light on coffee, full on Flavor. Sweet, Rich and Satisfying.. this coming from a 23 yr ex-smoker.  **** Note - Replace TPA Coffee with VZ Coffee (wasn't in the flavor list so I put TPA). You can use any Coffee you wish, but I have found VZ Coffee to combine with the Cereal notes the best.
